Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale red pottery grooved jar, the fabric is partially grey in section, the exterior is grooved and bears traces of one line of incised Coptic text.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394172) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394172)
